prompt: A whimsical and enchanting scene in a misty swamp, bathed in an eerie, blue glow from mysterious will-o'-the-wisps floating above the murky waters. Vines with tiny, bioluminescent flowers hang from ancient trees, and fireflies dart about. The mist swirls with faintly glowing magical symbols, evoking a sense of curious, gentle magic. The art is dark yet vibrant, capturing the mystical allure of the swamp.
